name: Jurassic Cars: The Final Racing & Fighting Game
name_original: Jurassic Cars: The Final Racing & Fighting Game
description:
The world is at war. Rebel forces are trying to defeat the government but the war is taking too long! The combats are intense and none of the sides seems to have a real victory.
Evil forces decided to create a door to go to the past and bring back dinos, to win the war. The problem is that this big monsters can not be tamed and once they are here, they start destroying everything and everyone. The war got more intense and cruel.
The government sent the SWAT elite forces to end dinos zilla because this monsters started to be a real threat.

In this game you will be a dino trying to survive in this world at war against the SWAT, the police forces sent to destroy you:

- Play this funny game with different dinos zilla. Each dino has different skills, check them all!
- Test your racing skills in this survival races against SWAT
- This is an infinite race to improve your skills in the city of Tokyo with a dino zilla
- Amazing graphics and landscape
- Easy mobile controls in this monster races
- Wide range of SWAT enemies
- Stay alive as long as possible in this game full of action!
- Appropriate for children and adults who enjoy dino zilla race games

Like this monster game? Post a review so we can continue creating games for you!

Twitter: @bravocterogames
